item.title: Complex IUD Removals More Common Than Expected
item.description: About 1 in 10 IUD removals require complex procedures including operating room intervention. Medscape Medical News

item.title: NICE Rejects CLN2 Drug Over Cost Concerns
item.description: NICE has confirmed its rejection of the only treatment for CLN2 Batten disease, citing affordability concerns. Medscape News UK
